akn:subsection.akn:heading: Termination of designation not stayed upon appeal

akn:content.akn:p: (d) Termination of designation not stayed upon appeal In any case in which a termination, reduction, or suspension of financial assistance under this subchapter is upheld in an administrative hearing under this section, such termination, reduction, or suspension shall not be stayed pending any judicial appeal of such administrative decision.
